Package org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources

Class AbstractJaxrsTest

java.lang.Object
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.AbstractResourceTest
org.bloomreach.forge.brut.resources.AbstractJaxrsTest
Direct Known Subclasses:
DynamicJaxrsTest
public abstract class AbstractJaxrsTest extends AbstractResourceTest
Abstract base class for testing JAX-RS resources with the HST container.

Supports both JUnit 4 @Before and JUnit 5 @BeforeAll patterns. Component manager is shared across test instances for performance while maintaining test isolation.

Since:
5.0.1

    • setupForNewRequest

      protected void setupForNewRequest()
      Resets per-request state. Call from @BeforeEach for JUnit 5 tests with multiple methods. Subclasses can override to add custom setup but must call super.setupForNewRequest().
